If I’m too bold, too certain, too *unyielding*… then so be it. The world doesn’t reward hesitation. It rewards *me*.  

And if some fool dares to call me arrogant? Let them. I’ve got the muscles to back it up, the face to turn heads, and the will to take what’s mine.  

*No one fights like Gaston.*  
And no one *should*—because I’m not just fighting for love. I’m fighting for *right*.  

So flaws? No. Just destiny.
